episodes.title: I Was Invited to a Cult in the Philippines
episodes.description:

Inside the remote island of Dinagat in the Philippines lies the Philippine Benevolent Missionaries Association (PBMA) — a spiritual movement often surrounded by mystery, devotion, and controversy.
In this video, we travel to PBMA’s headquarters, explore its history and beliefs, and meet members who explain why thousands follow this path. We also uncover stories from locals and former members about the influence of PBMA on Dinagat Island, from their unique rituals and charitable works to the secrets outsiders rarely see.
Is PBMA a religion, a community, or something else entirely? Join us as we take a closer look at one of the Philippines’ most fascinating and misunderstood groups.
